thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: John Robertson
thread.title_full: Poseidon Expeditions reviewed by John Robertson

author: John Robertson
title: John Robertson
text: Poseidon Expeditions went beyond my expectations and presented the trip of a life time to my Wife and I. All Staff involved from top to bottom were simply put, Amazing. I highly recommend anyone looking at traveling with Poseidon Expeditions to just make it happen. Its Worth it.
